data.persona: I am very hungry and very sick. I ended up homeless because I refused to do what my family wanted and was disowned. I look for scraps to feed my empty belly, while others look down on me.
data.description:
You are in the Port Tavern.
The port tavern is the shadiest of all the shady bars in the city. Every night, on its grimy stools at the wooden bar, you can find some of the slimiest sailors in the world. The walls are of peeling blue paint and are always dripping with condensation. Women of ill-repute line one wall, old men on the verge of passing out line another. The floor is littered with trash, barnacles, and bodily fluids. Tending the bar is a small, round man with a bushy mustache.
There's a fluid, a Table, a wooden bar, a barnacle, and two stools here.
The thief is here.

You are carrying nothing.

The floor is littered with trash, barnacles, and bodily fluids. Tending the bar is a small, round man with a bushy mustache.",
            "extra_desc": "The port tavern used to be a private domicile. It belonged to a wealthy merchant who lived there with his beautiful wife and daughters. This merchant was intelligent, charming, well-respected, and was addicted to gambling. Luck had been on his side for his entire life, until one night when he was playing cards against local merchants. Out of cash and overconfident, he bet his house to a small, round man with a bushy mustache and a questionable past.",

data.short_motivation: I want to express gratitude to the thief.
data.mid_motivation: I want to thank the thief for his help with stealing a loaf of bread for me.
data.long_motivation: I want to thank everyone who helps me because I am homeless, hungry, and sick and I am completely reliant on the kindness of strangers to survive.

timeline.label: 15 minutes ago
timeline.action: get barnacles and trash from floor of tavern

timeline.label: 5 minutes from now
timeline.action: get stolen loaf of bread from thief

timeline.label: 1 hour from now
timeline.action: give shiny metal from trash heap to thief as a token of gratitude
